name: LAist
0:
”Alexa, open LAist”
”Alexa, launch LAist”
”Alexa, start LAist”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: la ist
Developer Terms of Use
des: LAist delivers you the latest news, straight from your favorite LAist and KPCC reporters. Using voice interactions, you can choose which stories you want to hear, and which ones you don't. Updated morning, noon, and night with fresh headlines.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
